snippet: Juan Martin del Potro ended Rafael Nadal's bid for an unprecedented second Olympic singles gold medal in a thrill-a-minute semifinal, then celebrated as if the title were already his, kneeling to kiss the court before leaping into the stands....
lead_paragraph: Juan Martin del Potro ended Rafael Nadal's bid for an unprecedented second Olympic singles gold medal in a thrill-a-minute semifinal, then celebrated as if the title were already his, kneeling to kiss the court before leaping into the stands.

headline.print_headline: Upset Over Nadal Puts Del Potro in Tennis Final vs. Murray
headline.main: Upset Over Nadal Puts Del Potro in Tennis Final vs. Murray
